snippet.title: Video Game Trailer | A day with Mochi | Supinfogame 2023
snippet.description:
Découvrez la bande annonce de "A day with Mochi", un jeu vidéo de fin d'année réalisé par nos talentueux étudiants en Game Design, Game Art et Game programming de la promotion 2022-2023 à Supinfogame.

Credits:

Arthur Galland / Lead Level Designer & Producer
Zoé Gerard / Art Director & Environment Artist
Gauthier Gobert / Level Designer
Simon Gonand / Lead Tech & Gameplay Programmer
Léo Gosselet / Environment Artist
Antoine Grugeon / Game Designer & Gameplay Programmer
Yanis Habib / Animator & 2D Artist
Chloé Plumey / Lead Game Artist & Environment Artist
Inès Pouille / Character & Prop Artist
Arthur Spellani / Lead Game Designer & Producer
Luc Vidal / Creative Director & Game Designer

Special Thanks

Nicolas Ceriani / VFX Artist
Estelle Cozot / Lighting Artist
Salma Hoï / 2D Artist
Rose Bleue / Sound Designer
Lucas Rea / 2D Concept Artist

**********

Intéressé(e) par l'une de nos formations Game à Supinfogame Rubika ? Fais ton choix 👇

Formation Game Art 👉 https://rubika-edu.com/game-art/

Formation Game Design 👉 https://rubika-edu.com/game-design/

Formation Game Progamming 👉 https://rubika-edu.com/game-programming/

**********

Plus de travaux de nos étudiants en Game sur le compte Instagram du cursus Supinfogame:
👉 https://www.instagram.com/supinfogame...

Les comptes Instagram de nos étudiants dans les autres filières:
👉 filière Animation (Supinfocom): https://www.instagram.com/supinfocom_...
👉 filière Design (ISD): 
https://www.instagram.com/isd_rubika

**********

#gamedev #gamedesign #gameart #gameprogramming
